articles.title: NYSE technical issue impacting some stock prices, incorrectly showing Berkshire Hathaway down 99% - CNBC
articles.description: Trading was halted in several stocks as the NYSE investigated a technical issue around its volatility controls.
articles.content:
A technical issue at the New York Stock Exchange on Monday caused the A-class shares of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway to appear to be down nearly 100%.

articles.title: Temasek, Fidelity buy $200M stake in Lenskart at $5B valuation - TechCrunch
articles.description: Temasek has previously invested in Lenskart, and this new funding follows a $500 million investment by the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority last year.
articles.content:
